Abortion: Physical Risks Incomplete abortion heavy bleeding infection uterine perforation damage to genital tract and internal organs
Financial Risks Loss of income financial burdens due to travel and mandatory counseling
Health System Costs Millions of dollars annually for postabortion treatment and lost income due to longterm disability

Hypertension: Most people with hypertension dont have symptoms
Very high blood pressure can cause headaches blurred vision chest pain
Untreated hypertension can lead to kidney disease heart disease stroke
